dataList.content: (더미)
Make sure that Hohenheim and Alyssa are not defeated before the Sinners.
It is recommended to focus on the Ring Nursefather's Skills whose Clashes must be won.
The Ring Nursefather and his Apprentice's powerful Skills can be weakened before Clashing.
It is recommended to attempt Clashes with Skills that are relatively easier to win.
Try prioritizing enemies with low HP first.
Nursefathers are difficult enemies for the Sinners.
It is important to make use of Vespa and Ezra's Assist Defense.
Use the Sinners to Clash with The Thumb Apprentice's Skills to weaken his powerful Skill.
Reduce The Thumb Apprentice's HP to below half.

The Thumb Apprentice is interfering with the Assist Units' attacks.
It is recommended to focus the Sinners' attacks on The Thumb Apprentice first.

When attacked, The Thumb Nursefather consumes her "Eye of Precognition" Stack to evade.
It is important to have the non-Sinner ally constantly drain her Eye of Precognition Stack.

You cannot redirect The Thumb Nursefather's powerful Skill.
Make sure to drain her Eye of Precognition as much as possible before the Skill is activated; the fewer Eye of Precognition Stacks she has, the weaker the Skill becomes.
It is important to make use of Vespa and Ezra's Assist Defense.
Strategize appropriately and make use of the opportunity to Stagger enemies with Unopposed Attacks.
When enemies are cornered and become stronger, focus on buying time rather than winning Clashes, and wait for the Assist Units to play their trump card.

The more The Roach Emperor wins his Clashes against the Sinners, the weaker he gets.
However, it is a very risky decision to have the Sinners deal with all of his Skills on their own.
"Hurting Pest [Roaches]" Stacks can be lowered by letting The Roach Emperor's "Emperor's Devouring" Skill hit you.
The Roach Emperor's Excision Coin Skills become much stronger against Skills with Unbreakable Coins.
Check for Sinners that can Clash against 'Destinated Opponent' Skill with suitable Attack Skills, and build up damage on The Pinky Nursefather.
Depending on the situation, it is important to plan impromptu and decide on which of The Pinky Nursefather's Skills should be Clashed first.
The Pinky Nursefather will go on the offensive if you have the advantage, and will go on the defensive if she has the advantage.
Strategize around surviving The Pinky Nursefather's attacks and slowly chip away at her health.
Focus on ensuring that Meursault and Outis survive the fight, rather than defeating Sora and Ren, the two Apprentices.
Every turn, Ryōshū will attack one of the two enemies—The Index Apprentice or The Pinky Apprentice.
It may be wise to let Ryōshū deal with one of the Apprentices while the Sinners focus on the other.

The Index Nursefather gains Karmic Consequence when he fails to carry out his Prescripts.
Raising his Karmic Consequence Stack weakens his various stats, including his Clash Power.

During a unique pattern, you will need high-Clashing Skills in all three Attack Types: Slash, Pierce, and Blunt.
Preparing high-Clashing E.G.O Skills in each Attack Type is recommended.

At low HP, The Index Nursefather uses a powerful Skill with a very high Power.
Ryōshū's Base E.G.O., "Forest for the Flames" may be effective against this attack.
